content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Sue Bryce's course is an excellent choice for improving your studio portrait photography skills. She's a highly respected photographer and educator, and her course is packed with valuable information and insights.

Remember, practice is key to improving your skills, so be sure to put what you learn into practice. Don't be afraid to experiment and try new things – it's all part of the learning process.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Good luck with your photography journey, and I hope you enjoy Sue Bryce's course!
